item.title: Species diversity as a surrogate for conservation of phylogenetic and functional diversity in terrestrial vertebrates across the Americas
item.description: Related materials Knowledge of species diversity may be sufficient to preserve other dimensions of biodiversity, Nature Ecology & Evolution Blog
